title: The Name of the Game
description: Trumpet Flower: FameMen wanted to be Sam Weaver, and women just wanted himâ€”every woman but Johanna Patterson, that is. Tall, dark and impossibly handsome, it was no wonder that his fame was rivaled only by his reputation! But surely a woman who'd learned her lessons the hard way could resist the most irresistible man alive... couldn't she?
author: Nora Roberts
